title: VR-Based Anatomy Practical Preparation and Learning Process Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Human Anatomy and Experience with Educational Simulation Tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening VR Anatomy Practice Process Design Competencies for Preservice Teachers in Language Education

learning_goals: Learners can identify major organ locations with 85% accuracy in a VR environment
Participants can establish pre-laboratory study plans with over 90% accuracy using 3D visualization materials before anatomy practice
Trainees can propose process improvement plans for practical training sessions four or more times by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
